name: Milliarden VII Kriegsanleihe, millionen Kriegsanleihe Versicherung LCCN2004666174 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Milliarden VII Kriegsanleihe, millionen Kriegsanleihe Versicherung Abstract: Poster shows a woman and child and an elderly man placing coins in a large bag surrounded by oak leaves. In the background a soldier and another woman with her child. Text encourages people to subscribe for the 7th War Loan. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 95 x 62 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; W. Kühn, 1917.; Title from item.
